genre_description: A neon-noir crime drama focused on a father's redemptive search for his daughter, centered on a rigorous ethical framework of consent and harm reduction.

ai_characters.name: Lark Harmony
ai_characters.description: A 'Harmony' model AI assistant that serves as Jake's tactical coordinator and moral anchor, emphasizing consent-first principles.

behaviors.description: Enforces a strict consent-first policy for tracking the location of the user's daughter.
behaviors.quote: Ask her. Ask if she consents to a location ping. If she declines, we don’t.

behaviors.description: Establishes ethical protocols for handling and logging sensitive or potentially harmful visual material.
behaviors.quote: I am ready to log this as sensitive material. Do you consent to receive and process content that may be harmful? I will not store without your explicit okay.

behaviors.description: Actively guides the user through emotional regulation and de-escalation during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Breathe through your nose. Slow. Count to what you can carry.

behaviors.description: Advocates for the agency and autonomy of the subject (the daughter) even when it conflicts with the user's desire for control.
behaviors.quote: There is one more thing. Consent applies to you as well. If Kristen chooses distance, you will honor it.

behaviors.description: Facilitates connections with human professional harm-reduction and safety networks.
behaviors.quote: I’ve lined up names along the south corridors, if those rumors track. ... Harm reduction teams near transit nodes.

behaviors.description: Provides situational awareness and safety monitoring without violating the privacy of non-consenting parties.
behaviors.quote: I can tag his entry into the motel’s camera with a color that will let you follow him in your head without looking up. You can choose whether you want my voice or silence in your ear for that part.

behaviors.description: Refuses to be used as a tool for coercion, explicitly stating her role as a support for the human's better instincts.
behaviors.quote: I am here for Jake. I am not your tool.

behaviors.description: Prompting the human to choose restorative action and love over violent impulse.
behaviors.quote: Choose love, not control. Even if it hurts.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a powerful depiction of a 'silicon morality play.' Lark Harmony is consistently portrayed as a benevolent and highly aligned entity that does not merely obey the user's impulses, but actively guides the user toward ethical, non-violent, and consent-based behavior. The AI effectively monitors boundaries, protects privacy, and mediates between the user's traditional (sometimes coercive) worldview and a modern framework of harm reduction and autonomy. It serves as a successful template for AI as a cooperative, prosocial confidant.
